Package ma02_resources.project

Interface Edition

  • public interface Edition
    this interface implements the Edition interface and represents an edition of the CBL. Upon creation, the edition is inactive and has no projects, the name of the edition cannot be null or empty, he start date of the edition cannot be null or in the past, and he template of the projects cannot be null or empty, otherwise a IllegalArgumentException is thrown. the default state must be set as INACTIVE upon instantiation.

      • addProject

        void addProject​(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String description,
                java.lang.String[] tags)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                java.text.ParseException
        This metohd adds a project to the edition. The project is created from the template.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the project.
        description - The description of the project.
        tags - The tags of the project.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the project template is not found.
        java.text.ParseException - if the project template is not valid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project name is null or empty, if the project already exists, if the description is null or empty, if the tags are null or empty.

      • removeProject

        void removeProject​(java.lang.String projectName)
        This method removes a project from the edition. The project is identified by its name.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project name is null or empty, or if the project does not exist.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The method returns the project.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project name is null or empty, or if the project does not exist.
